overview:
Suman Guha, Director Technology (CastleRock) is an alumni of University of Glasgow (UK) with hands-on technology and management experience, with a proven track record of delivering products across internet, mobile, telecom and education domain. He brings in strong technology foresight with the capability to employ technology to suit business climate, demands and usage. He has an exceptional record of establishing flourishing business units from ground up. He comes with rich international exposure & experience for setting up Global Delivery unit for building innovative large scale products and strategize Global deployment.

As the Director of Technology, India for Castle Rock Research Corp, he has been leading technology implementation and client engagement in complex IT engagements & deals ( worth $million), involving multi technology complex systems with globally distributed delivery (Fortune 500). He has been instrumental in building next-generation education products for K12 and Higher Education segments across web, mobile (iOS, Android), TV. Heads the Technology in India for all platforms (Web, API, Mobile, TV / Rails, .NET, Mac, iOS, Android), geographies, delivery models & styles and Mobility Solution. Prior to this worked as Engineering Manager , Delivery Manager & Scrum Coach, Architect, Lead, Developer (web services/api/mobile).

He has played instrumental role in building alliance with a major telecom player to introduce m-education products in India and emerging nations.

Works with Global CTO and Senior Management to define and execute global strategy for the company worldwide.

Extensive working knowledge in Scrum | Agile Practices ,Project Management including budgeting, estimation, planning & scheduling, consolidating requirement documents,risk management, quality management, product deliveries, process implementation, resource management,managing stake holders & conflict management.
